issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Trying to explore the new Box2d API and loaded the Module and Test App from GitHub.

Building and Launching the application works fine EXCEPT that the Ti.Box2d module throws a Verification Issue error stating that the module requires subscription.

I would not have expected that from the original Blog Post.

This is related to the Q&A question: [http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/125839/tiball-sample-app-throwing-a-validation-issue-with-box2d-module#comment-98491]
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio
Box2d Module v0.9 from GitHub
TiBall example app

comments.body: This has been corrected if you re-download the module
